description: Resilience Update: Adds anti-takedown toolkit with static site generation for IPFS, Tor, and decentralized hosting compatibility.
changes: Anti-Takedown Toolkit: Introduced a new 'Resilience Center' in the admin dashboard.
Static Site Generation: Ability to export your entire blog as a collection of static HTML files.
Decentralized Compatibility: Static exports are optimized for hosting on IPFS, Tor, and other SQL-free environments.
ZIP Export: One-click download of your entire site bundle for easy mirror creation.
New Templates: Dedicated static-friendly templates for index and post pages.
Admin Navigation: Integration of the Resilience Center into the main dashboard and settings pages.
